License Name: Training Facility License
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue, renew and cancel the license of a training facility that provides programs, qualifying courses and developmental courses.
Service Name: Issuance of an investment license for the foreign investor
Conditions/Requirements:
• The investment activity shall not be included in the list of activities excluded from foreign investment.
• Product specifications should match the Saudi, GCC  or international specifications.
• Applicant shall not have conclusive rulings against him due to violations of system provisions inside or outside the Kingdom.
• Applicant shall abide by the conditions and regulations attached to the investment license application form.
• Investment objectives shall be achieved and conditions and regulations on license renewal applications shall be implemented. 
• Presence of a license to practice commercial activity in the Kingdom for foreign investors.
• Presence of commercial register and articles of association of the facility in its country, certified by respective entities and Saudi embassy.
• A commercial register or an extract from the civil status as a proof of profession.
• Presence of Articles of association for a limited liability company.
• Presence of the articles of association for a  joint-stock company.
• Presence of the general manager's passport.
• Presence of the national ID and the family card if one of the partners has the Saudi nationality.
• Submission of the partners' decision stating their desire to invest in the Kingdom, indicating the partners' names, the capital, the ownership percentage of each partner, the main office of the facility and the nature of its activity.
• Appointment of a general manager, determining his powers and certifying it by respective entities and the Saudi embassy.
• Provision of initial approval from the relevant ministries or agencies if the activity requires approval.
• Provision of a detailed action plan.
• Submission of a minimum of 3 year budget for the facility requesting a license from outside the Kingdom, showing the soundness of the financial position. The budget must be approved by an accounting office and certified by the concerned body and the Kingdom’s embassy.
• Proof of financial capability to invest, commensurate with the project's capital and each partner's share, in line with the submitted business plan.
• Reservation of a trade name with the Ministry of Commerce.
Service Description: Issuing an investment license for non-Saudis to practice commercial activities in accordance with the specified conditions and requirements.
Additional Information:
A value of 10,000 SAR will be added to the subscription to the services of the Investor Relations Centers at the Ministry of Investment in the first year, and 60,000 SAR in the following year/years.
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist already.
This procedure is automated.
This procedure requires payment. .

License Name: Training Facility License
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue, renew and cancel the license of a training facility that provides programs, qualifying courses and developmental courses.
Conditions/Requirements:
•Applicant must be 18 years old or above.
•The employee must not be a governmental employee.
•The capital shall not be less than 5000 SAR.
•It is not required to issue a branch register for the same activity, practiced in the same administrative region.
Issuing the main register requires the following:
• Electronically submitting an application to establish the company.
• Submitting a letter signed by the founders establishing the company.
• Presence of a national ID.
Issuing a main register for joint-stock companies requires:
•Minimum capital of 500,000 SAR.
•Presence of the company's articles of association and articles of incorporation.
Issuing a branch register requires:
• Submitting a letter from the company stating the issuance of a company branch, including the city of the branch and the branch manager, attested by the Chamber of Commerce.
• Confirmation of the investor's deposit at the end of the company's fiscal year.
Service Description: A legal document that contains the investor's data and his activity, enabling him to carry out his activity with an official permit in accordance with the specific conditions and requirements.
Additional Information:
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.
This procedure is automated.
This procedure requires payment.

License Name: Training Facility License
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue, renew and cancel the license of a training facility that provides programs, qualifying courses and developmental courses.
Conditions/Requirements:
The requirements and prerequisites for obtaining and renewing a healthcare license, or modifying it by transferring location or ownership to another investor, include the following:

Valid commercial registration.
Valid commercial activity license.
Governmental approval/license.
Founding contract for companies.
Safety certificate issued by the Civil Defense.
Compliance certificate issued by the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development.
Subsidiary commercial registration under the name of the training facility, starting with the words "Center" or "Institute" and ending with a word related to training.
All partners must be Saudi nationals or citizens of GCC countries.
Training should be provided free of charge.
Fulfilling the main requirements from relevant authorities (Ministry of Commerce, Saudi Post, Ministry of Investment).
Providing all information and data according to approved templates.
The training facility should not be used as a means to obtain any form of material or monetary support or solicit donations.
The system should allow training to be provided to non-employees.
Appointing a legal agent for the institution or company, or an authorized representative.
Additional requirements for foreign investors include:

Possessing an investment license for the training sector from the Ministry of Investment.
The company or entity should be specialized in training and officially registered in the home country.
The company should have at least one year of experience in the field of training.
Service Description: Obtaining the initial approval after verifying that the necessary conditions for issuing a training license are met.
Additional Information:
This procedure is automated.
This action requires payment.
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.

Additional Information: This step is illustrative and not mandatory for license issuance.

License Name: Training Facility License
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue, renew and cancel the license of a training facility that provides programs, qualifying courses and developmental courses.
Service Name: Issuance of a license to practice commercial activity and a safety certificate
Service Fees: Depending on the activity classification + survey fees of 20 SAR
Conditions/Requirements:
Presence of a valid commercial register.
Presence of a permit from the Civil Defense, if there is an office.
Presence of articles of association of the companies.
Presence of the title deed or the lease contract if there is an office.
Applicant shall not be prohibited from practicing the activity.
Applicant shall be committed to fulfilling the conditions of the activity.
Applicant shall be committed to updating the data in the system.
Applicant shall be able to request issuance of a license for his shop on his own behalf or on behalf of another, with a copy of the legal proxy.
Applicant shall ensure the validity and accuracy of the data entered, bearing in mind that all transactions that take place through the beneficiary's account are binding (remove on him.)
The attached documents shall match the original copies.
Service Description: Fulfilling all the procedures, conditions and data required to conduct the  activity, and inspecting the site to to ensure it is licensed in accordance with safety conditions and requirements.
Additional Information:
This procedure is automated.
This action requires payment.
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.

License Name: Training Facility License
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue, renew and cancel the license of a training facility that provides programs, qualifying courses and developmental courses.
Service Name: Request of activitation of training programs
Service Fees: 5000 SAR, including application study  and  visit
Conditions/Requirements:
Presence of a (remove commercial) municipal license.
Submission of an activation request, provided that there is no sanction preventing authorization.
Obtainment of certificate of alignement from the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development (certificate of a work environment that supports the work of individuals with disabilities) for private training facilities.
Submission of the approval of the Civil Defense unless previously submitted.
Approval of the necessary equipment for activation in accordance with the requirements of the training program.
Approval of the necessary training body  for activation in accordance with the requirements of the training program.
Approval of the necessary administrative body for activation, unless previously approved.
All information and data shall be filled out in accordance with the approved forms.
Service Description: Requesting the activation of training programs, ensuring that they conform to standards, are free of any gaps, and working to improve the deliverables and amending what is necessary.
Additional Information:
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.
This procedure is automated.
1000 SAR is paid for each program or training field.
1000 SAR is paid for each additional visit.

License Name: Playing a musical instrument license
License Description: This service enables the investor to practice the activity of playing music at events.
Service Fees: Included in the license issuance step
Conditions/Requirements:
General Conditions:
* The practitioner shall pay the fees when applying for and renewing the license, and to pay any financial rights stipulated by the law.
* The practitioner shall comply with copyright and other local regulations, and with the original music content created.
* The practitioner shall initiate renewal procedures 20 days before the expiry date of the license, and is not entitled to practice the activity after the expiry of the license if it is not renewed.
* The issued license shall indicate the type of licensed activity, and the license holder shall abide by the type of activity specified for him.
* The Music Commission shall be notified of any change in the licensee's data, or the information contained in the license.
* The Music Commission shall be provided with all the reports, data, information, studies, or statistics related to the licensed activity.
* The license application shall be filled out.
*  The license is subject to cancellation according to the following:
- If the delay in renewing the license exceeds a period of 6 months after the expiry of its term without presenting an acceptable excuse.
- If the licensee died, and the heirs did not claim the license to continue and change its ownership to another party, after 6 months from the end of the license suspension period.
- If a penalty is issued that includes revocation or temporary suspension of the license from any judicial authority or relevant committees.
- If the entity or practitioner requests to cancel the license, bearing in mind that the fees are not refundable regardless of the remaining period of the license.
- If the profession is not practiced for a full year without an acceptable excuse.
- If the licensee breaches the conditions.
*No one shall play (original) music without obtaining a license from the issuing authority, and it is also necessary to obtain the required licenses from other government entities according to the rules and regulations.

Special Conditions:
* The presence of the Nationa ID, or residency and passport of the foreigner.
* Evidence of sufficient academic qualifications shall be provided.
Provide reliable certificates of the practitioner's experience and qualifications in playing music.
* A high-quality video, with clear sound, and a recent date of no more than 7 days shall be provided, in which the applicant's face with the musical instrument appears clearly and completely, showing the hands of the performer during the performance. The duration of the video shall range from 45 seconds and not more than a minute and a half.
* The singing performance is allowed to be accompanied by a musical instrument.
*  Proof of sufficient experience shall be provided
* The type of performance shall be specified.
* The performance shall be solo and not accompanied by any other musical instrument.
* The practitioner shall not be allowed to record inside audio studios.
Service Description:
Submitting a request to obtain a license to play music on the (Abde'a) platform.
https://abdea.moc.gov.sa/site/

This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist
This procedure is automated.
This procedure requires payment.

License Name: Literary agent activity license
License Description: This service enables the investor to engage in the activity of literary agency to represent the author and work to sell his works, whether by publishing them as books in dealing with local and international publishing houses, or selling the author's works for use in film or television production or others.
Ministry Involved:
Conditions ... and advising them on all available options.
* The agent shall maintain separate bank accounts for each client to deposit due amounts, and pay the dues in a period of time agreed upon by both parties.
* The term of the activity license shall be one or two years, and it may be renewed for a similar period.
*  Proof of sufficient experience shall be provided
* Two parties shall not be represented in the same transaction.
* The agent shall not obtain profits without the knowledge of the client.
Conditions/Requirements:
General conditions:
* The holder of the license shall initiate the renewal 3 months before the expiration date, and he is not entitled to practice the activity as of the expiry date of the license period without renewing it.
* The Literature, Publishing and Translation Commission shall be provided with all the reports, data, information, studies, or statistics related to the licensed activity.
* The license application shall be filled out.
* The Literature, Publishing and Translation Commission shall be notified of any change in the licensee's data, or the information contained in it.
* The license shall be considered subject to cancellation according to the following:
- If the delay in renewing the license exceeds a period of 6 months after the expiry of its term without presenting an acceptable excuse.
- If the licensee died, and the heirs did not claim the license to continue and change its ownership to another party, after 6 months from the end of the license suspension period.
- If a penalty is issued that includes canceling the license.
- If the activity has not been practiced after 6 months from the date of issuance of the license.
- If the profession has not been practiced for a full year.
* The license applicant shall not practice the activity without obtaining a license from the Literature, Publishing and Translation Commission. He is also required to obtain the necessary licenses from other government agencies according to the rules and regulations.
* The license shall not be assigned to others or a partner entered without the approval of the Literature, Publishing and Translation Commission.
Special Conditions:
* Having a National ID.
* The agent shall maintain a record containing all the works of the authors for whom he worked as a literary agent, in addition to the information of the writers, publishers, and publication details.
* The agent shall document his relations with the authors in contracts that clarify the limits of this relationship, from the obligations and rights of both parties, and include all services provided, costs and time period.
* The agent shall provide commercial and technical services to his clients, provided that no conflict of interest is permitted.
* The agent shall keep clients informed of all transactions related to them and of their business, and is not entitled to hide or prevent clients from knowing any details regarding their work.
* The agent shall maintain the privacy and confidentiality of his clients' information, and he is not entitled to disclose any information without prior permission.
* The agent shall look for ways to add value to its clients by introducing them to all aspects of the publishing process, and advising them on all available options.
* The agent shall maintain separate bank accounts for each client to deposit the due amounts, and pay the dues in a period of time agreed upon by both parties.
* The term of the activity license shall be one or two years, and it may be renewed for a similar period.
*Proof of sufficient experience shall be provided
* Two parties shall not be represented in the same transaction.
* The agent shall not obtain profits without the knowledge of the client.
Service Description:
Submitting a request to obtain a literary agent activity license through the (Abde'a) platform.
https://abdea.moc.gov.sa/site/
Additional Information:
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.
This procedure is automated.
This procedure requires payment.

License Name: License of the activity of the literary agency, if there is an existing building
License Description: This service enables the investor to engage in the activity of a literary agency to represent the author and play the role of mediator between him and the beneficiaries of his intellectual output, such as publishing houses, film, television, music or advertising companies, etc., with the aim of enabling the author to obtain the best possible return on his writings, according to the best legal, contractual and marketing practices that preserve his rights.
Service Name: Issuance of an investment license for the foreign investor
Conditions/Requirements:
• The investment activity shall not be included in the list of activities excluded from foreign investment.
• Product specifications should match the Saudi, GCC  or international specifications.
• Applicant shall not have conclusive rulings against him due to violations of system provisions inside or outside the Kingdom.
• Applicant shall abide by the conditions and regulations attached to the investment license application form.
• Investment objectives shall be achieved and conditions and regulations on license renewal applications shall be implemented. 
• Presence of a license to practice commercial activity in the Kingdom for foreign investors.
• Presence of commercial register and articles of association of the facility in its country, certified by respective entities and Saudi embassy.
• A commercial register or an extract from the civil status as a proof of profession.
• Presence of Articles of association for a limited liability company.
• Presence of the articles of association for a  joint-stock company.
• Presence of the general manager's passport.
• Presence of the national ID and the family card if one of the partners has the Saudi nationality.
• Submission of the partners' decision stating their desire to invest in the Kingdom, indicating the partners' names, the capital, the ownership percentage of each partner, the main office of the facility and the nature of its activity.
• Appointment of a general manager, determining his powers and certifying it by respective entities and the Saudi embassy.
• Provision of initial approval from the relevant ministries or agencies if the activity requires approval.
• Provision of a detailed action plan.
• Submission of a minimum of 3 year budget for the facility requesting a license from outside the Kingdom, showing the soundness of the financial position. The budget must be approved by an accounting office and certified by the concerned body and the Kingdom’s embassy.
• Proof of financial capability to invest, commensurate with the project's capital and each partner's share, in line with the submitted business plan.
• Reservation of a trade name with the Ministry of Commerce.
Service Description: Issuing an investment license for non-Saudis to practice commercial activities in accordance with the specified conditions and requirements.
Additional Information:
• The investment activity shall not be included in the list of activities excluded from foreign investment.
• The product specifications shall be in conformity with the Saudi, Gulf or international specifications.
• The applicant shall not have final decisions issued against him due to violations of the provisions of the system inside or outside the Kingdom.
• The license applicant shall abide by the conditions and undertakings attached to the investment license application form.
• Granting the license shall achieve investment objectives and apply these conditions and controls to license renewal requests.
• To be a foreign investor with a license to practice commercial activity in the Kingdom.
• The presence of the commercial registration and articles of association of the facility in its country, certified by the competent authorities and the Saudi embassy.
• Presence of the commercial register to prove the profession or an extract from the civil status.
• Presence of articles of association of a limited liability company.
• Presence of Articles of Association of the joint-stock company.
• Presence of a passport for the general manager.
• Presence of the national ID and the family card if one of the partners has the Saudi nationality.
• Submitting the partners' decision stating their desire to invest in the Kingdom, indicating the names of the partners, the capital, the ownership percentage of each partner, the main office of the facility and the nature of the activity.
•Appointing the general manager and determining his powers, certified by the competent authorities and the Saudi embassy.
• Providing initial approval from the relevant ministries or agencies if the activity requires approval.
• Providing a detailed action plan.
• Submitting a budget for the facility requesting a license from outside the Kingdom for a period of not less than 3 years, showing the soundness of the financial situation, approved by an accounting office and certified by the concerned body and the Kingdom's embassy.
• Evidence of the financial ability to invest in proportion to the capital of the project and the share of each partner and in accordance with the action plan submitted.
• Reserving a trade name from the Ministry of Commerce.

License Name: License of the activity of the literary agency, if there is an existing building
License Description: This service enables the investor to engage in the activity of a literary agency to represent the author and play the role of mediator between him and the beneficiaries of his intellectual output, such as publishing houses, film, television, music or advertising companies, etc., with the aim of enabling the author to obtain the best possible return on his writings, according to the best legal, contractual and marketing practices that preserve his rights.
Conditions/Requirements:
•  The age shall be 18 and above.
• The employee shall not be a government employee.
• The capital shall not be less than 5000 SAR.
• It shall not be required to issue a branch register if the activity is the same as the administrative region.
The issuance of a main register requires:
• Submitting an application to establish the company electronically.
• Submitting a letter signed by the founders establishing the company.
• Having a national identity.
The issuance of a main register for joint-stock companies requires:,The capital shall not be less than 500,000 SAR.
Submission of the company's articles of association.

The issuance of a branch Register requires:
Submitting a letter from the company stating the issuance of a company branch, including the city of the branch and the branch manager, certified by the Chamber of Commerce.
Confirmation of the investor's deposit after the end of the company's fiscal year.
Service Description: A legal document that contains the investors's data and his activity, enabling him to carry out his activity with an official permit in accordance with the specific conditions and requirements.
Additional Information:
It is not required to issue a branch register in the event of a desire to practice the same activity, in the same administrative region, and under the same existing trade name.
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.
This procedure is automated.
This procedure requires payment.

* - If a penalty is issued that includes canceling the license.
- If the activity has not been practiced after 6 months from the date of issuance of the license.
* The license applicant shall not practice the activity without obtaining a license from the Literature, Publishing and Translation Commission. He is also required to obtain the necessary licenses from other government agencies according to the rules and regulations.
* The license shall not be assigned to a third party or partner shall not be introduced without the approval of the Literature, Publishing and Translation Commission.
special conditions:

License Name: Licensing of local and international parcels shipping in the absence of an existing building
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue a license to provide parcel transportation services inside and outside the Kingdom.
Conditions/Requirements:
* That the commercial registration of the establishment be valid, and that it includes the activity of transporting parcels (local and international). 
 * That the license applicant adhere to the general specifications and provisions stipulated in the guide issued by the entity 
* To agree to the declaration form related to financial integrity and lack of criminal record.
* The license applicant must agree to inquire about him through the SIMAH system and list system.
* Payment of the financial fee.
 * Submission of an operational plan for the project that includes the following:
- Geographical coverage within the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
- The expected number of dispatches internally and externally, and the quarterly expansion plan for a period of two years.
- The rules and regulations of the company that will practice the activity.
- The Memorandum of Association is documented and the percentage of ownership is indicated in it. 
* Providing documents related to the applicant’s international branches, owned by him in 5 countries and 5 different continents, provided that each country has one processing center as a minimum, or submitting a document of the relationship with the international facility licensed in the country of origin, and linked to the guarantee or franchise as an exclusive agent and her experience should not be less than 5 years in this field, and the document indicates the following: - International facility data includes (the name of the facility - the country of origin - the main headquarters).
- A founding contract for the international facility is documented and explained by ownership rates.
- The locations of the international facility in the countries of the world.
- The website of the international establishment.
- The major shipments assembly points outside the Kingdom include (the treatment center - the state - the address - the license issued by the country of origin).
- Executive director and international branches managers and communication information with them.
- The person authorized for the international facility, the data of communication with him and his identity.
- The mechanism of work, the method of delivering, receiving and delivering parcels.
Service Description: Obtaining the license after verifying the completeness of the documents and fulfilling the necessary conditions.
Additional Information:
This procedure is automated.
This procedure requires payment.

Service Name: Issuance of an investment license for the foreign investor
Conditions/Requirements:
• The investment activity shall not be included in the list of activities excluded from foreign investment.
• Product specifications should match the Saudi, GCC  or international specifications.
• Applicant shall not have conclusive rulings against him due to violations of system provisions inside or outside the Kingdom.
• Applicant shall abide by the conditions and regulations attached to the investment license application form.
• Investment objectives shall be achieved and conditions and regulations on license renewal applications shall be implemented. 
• Presence of a license to practice commercial activity in the Kingdom for foreign investors.
• Presence of commercial register and articles of association of the facility in its country, certified by respective entities and Saudi embassy.
• A commercial register or an extract from the civil status as a proof of profession.
• Presence of Articles of association for a limited liability company.
• Presence of the articles of association for a  joint-stock company.
• Presence of the general manager's passport.
• Presence of the national ID and the family card if one of the partners has the Saudi nationality.
• Submission of the partners' decision stating their desire to invest in the Kingdom, indicating the partners' names, the capital, the ownership percentage of each partner, the main office of the facility and the nature of its activity.
• Appointment of a general manager, determining his powers and certifying it by respective entities and the Saudi embassy.
• Provision of initial approval from the relevant ministries or agencies if the activity requires approval.
• Provision of a detailed action plan.
• Submission of a minimum of 3 year budget for the facility requesting a license from outside the Kingdom, showing the soundness of the financial position. The budget must be approved by an accounting office and certified by the concerned body and the Kingdom’s embassy.
• Proof of financial capability to invest, commensurate with the project's capital and each partner's share, in line with the submitted business plan.
• Reservation of a trade name with the Ministry of Commerce.
Service Description: Issuance of an investment license for non-Saudis to practice commercial activities in accordance with the specified conditions and requirements.
Additional Information:
A value of 10,000 SAR will be added to the subscription to the services of the Investor Relations Centers at the Ministry of Investment in the first year, and 60,000 SAR in the following years/year.				
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.				
This procedure is automated.				
This procedure requires payment.

License Name: Public fare licence
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport passengers by public taxis for a fee.
Conditions/Requirements:
•Applicant must be 18 years old or above.
•The employee must not be a governmental employee.
•The capital shall not be less than 5000 SAR.
•It is not required to issue a branch register for the same activity, practiced in the same administrative region.
Issuing the main register requires the following:
• Electronically submitting an application to establish the company.
• Submitting a letter signed by the founders establishing the company.
• Presence of a national ID.
Issuing a main register for joint-stock companies requires:
•Minimum capital of 500,000 SAR.
•Presence of the company's articles of association and articles of incorporation.
Issuing a branch register requires:
• Submitting a letter from the company stating the issuance of a company branch, including the city of the branch and the branch manager, attested by the Chamber of Commerce.
• Confirmation of the investor's deposit at the end of the company's fiscal year.
Service Description: A legal document that contains the investor's data and his activity, enabling him to carry out his activity with an official permit in accordance with the specific conditions and requirements
Additional Information:

This procedure is automated.

License Name: Public fare licence
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport passengers by public taxis for a fee.
Conditions/Requirements:
* The license applicant must abide by the regulations specified by the Transport General Authority  and the regulations stipulated in any other bylaw.
* The application must be submitted by the facility through the channels of the Transport General Authority.
* The cars must be new and have not been previously registered inside or outside the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, and the specifications approved by the President of the General Transport Authority determine the operating age of the taxis.
* That a suitable center be provided in the city in accordance with the requirements of the approved municipality, and the requirements issued by the relevant  authorities.
* That the minimum number of cars necessary to carry out the activity is provided according to the specifications approved by the Chairman of the Transport General Authority, provided that the minimum number is directly owned by the facility, or through financial leasing contracts, provided that the facility is the actual user of the car.
* That 2% of the total number of cars in the facility be provided for persons with mobility disabilities and the elderly, with at least one car that conforms to the specifications approved by the Chairman of the Transport General Authority.
* To be registered in the (Naql) portal.
* Payment of fees
Service Description: Obtaining the license after verifying the completeness of the documents.
Additional Information: This procedure is automated.

* Presence of a valid periodic technical examination certificate.
* Presence of a valid car insurance policy.
* Presentation of the customs card for the facility's car.
* Proof of identification for the individual.
* Proof  proof of the individual's occupation.
* Payment of financial penalties, if any.
* The car must be intended for transporting passengers, according to the required specifications.
* That the individual's car be linked to an authorized steering office, and the facility's car is linked to its automated system dedicated to tracking and steering its cars at the establishment's headquarters, or contracting with one of the steering offices qualified by the Transport General Authority to direct cars on its behalf.
* The establishment's license to practice the activity must be valid.

License Name: A license to transport passengers by buses outside the Kingdom
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue a license to transport and deport passengers by buses outside the Kingdom for a fee.
Conditions/Requirements:
•Applicant must be 18 years old or above.
•The employee must not be a governmental employee.
•The capital shall not be less than 5000 SAR.
•It is not required to issue a branch register for the same activity, practiced in the same administrative region.
Issuing the main register requires the following:
• Electronically submitting an application to establish the company.
• Submitting a letter signed by the founders establishing the company.
• Presence of a national ID.
Issuing a main register for joint-stock companies requires:
•Minimum capital of 500,000 SAR.
•Presence of the company's articles of association and articles of incorporation.
Issuing a branch register requires:
• Submitting a letter from the company stating the issuance of a company branch, including the city of the branch and the branch manager, attested by the Chamber of Commerce.
• Confirmation of the investor's deposit at the end of the company's fiscal year.
Service Description: A legal document that contains the investor's data and his activity, enabling him to carry out his activity with an official permit in accordance with the specific conditions and requirements

Amending the terms and conditions to be...

* The license applicant must abide by any electronic systems specified by the Transport General Authority.
* The fees and fines, if any, must be paid.

Service Name: Issuance of an investment license for the foreign investor
Conditions/Requirements:
• The investment activity shall not be included in the list of activities excluded from foreign investment.
• Product specifications should match the Saudi, GCC  or international specifications.
• Applicant shall not have conclusive rulings against him due to violations of system provisions inside or outside the Kingdom.
• Applicant shall abide by the conditions and regulations attached to the investment license application form.
• Investment objectives shall be achieved and conditions and regulations on license renewal applications shall be implemented. 
• Presence of a license to practice commercial activity in the Kingdom for foreign investors.
• Presence of commercial register and articles of association of the facility in its country, certified by respective entities and Saudi embassy.
• A commercial register or an extract from the civil status as a proof of profession.
• Presence of Articles of association for a limited liability company.
• Presence of the articles of association for a  joint-stock company.
• Presence of the general manager's passport.
• Presence of the national ID and the family card if one of the partners has the Saudi nationality.
• Submission of the partners' decision stating their desire to invest in the Kingdom, indicating the partners' names, the capital, the ownership percentage of each partner, the main office of the facility and the nature of its activity.
• Appointment of a general manager, determining his powers and certifying it by respective entities and the Saudi embassy.
• Provision of initial approval from the relevant ministries or agencies if the activity requires approval.
• Provision of a detailed action plan.
• Submission of a minimum of 3 year budget for the facility requesting a license from outside the Kingdom, showing the soundness of the financial position. The budget must be approved by an accounting office and certified by the concerned body and the Kingdom’s embassy.
• Proof of financial capability to invest, commensurate with the project's capital and each partner's share, in line with the submitted business plan.
• Reservation of a trade name with the Ministry of Commerce.
Service Description: Issuing an investment license for non-Saudis to practice commercial activities in accordance with the specified conditions and requirements.
Additional Information:
A value of 10,000 SAR will be added to the subscription to the services of the Investor Relations Centers at the Ministry of Investment in the first year, and 60,000 SAR in the following years/year.				
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.				
This procedure is automated.				
This procedure requires payment.

Additional Information: No data available

Licensing Entity Name: The General Authority of Civil Aviation
License Name: Licensing of aviation schools
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue a license for aviation schools. For the purpose of training and rehabilitation and giving lessons and training courses necessary for that.
Service Name: Feasibility study and preparation of financial statements
Service Description: Studying all economic, technical and legal considerations to see the extent of success, in addition to preparing all financial operations data related to the entity.

This step is illustrative and not mandatory for license issuance.				
The financial statements are prepared after the issuance of the commercial registration in the event of contracting with a local accounting office.

Licensing Entity Name: The General Authority of Civil Aviation
License Name: Licensing of aviation schools
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue a license for aviation schools. For the purpose of training and rehabilitation and giving lessons and training courses necessary for that.
Service Name: Issuance of an investment license for the foreign investor
Conditions/Requirements:
• The investment activity shall not be included in the list of activities excluded from foreign investment.
• Product specifications should match the Saudi, GCC  or international specifications.
• Applicant shall not have conclusive rulings against him due to violations of system provisions inside or outside the Kingdom.
• Applicant shall abide by the conditions and regulations attached to the investment license application form.
• Investment objectives shall be achieved and conditions and regulations on license renewal applications shall be implemented. 
• Presence of a license to practice commercial activity in the Kingdom for foreign investors.
• Presence of commercial register and articles of association of the facility in its country, certified by respective entities and Saudi embassy.
• A commercial register or an extract from the civil status as a proof of profession.
• Presence of Articles of association for a limited liability company.
• Presence of the articles of association for a  joint-stock company.
• Presence of the general manager's passport.
• Presence of the national ID and the family card if one of the partners has the Saudi nationality.
• Submission of the partners' decision stating their desire to invest in the Kingdom, indicating the partners' names, the capital, the ownership percentage of each partner, the main office of the facility and the nature of its activity.
• Appointment of a general manager, determining his powers and certifying it by respective entities and the Saudi embassy.
• Provision of initial approval from the relevant ministries or agencies if the activity requires approval.
• Provision of a detailed action plan.
• Submission of a minimum of 3 year budget for the facility requesting a license from outside the Kingdom, showing the soundness of the financial position. The budget must be approved by an accounting office and certified by the concerned body and the Kingdom’s embassy.
• Proof of financial capability to invest, commensurate with the project's capital and each partner's share, in line with the submitted business plan.
• Reservation of a trade name with the Ministry of Commerce.
Service Description: Issuing an investment license for non-Saudis to practice commercial activities in accordance with the specified conditions and requirements.
Additional Information:
A value of 10,000 SAR will be added to the subscription to the services of the Investor Relations Centers at the Ministry of Investment in the first year, and 60,000 SAR in the following years/year.				
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.				
This procedure is automated.				
This procedure requires payment.

Licensing Entity Name: The General Authority of Civil Aviation
License Name: Licensing of aviation schools
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue a license for aviation schools. For the purpose of training and rehabilitation and giving lessons and training courses necessary for that.
Conditions/Requirements:
•Applicant must be 18 years old or above.
•The employee must not be a governmental employee.
•The capital shall not be less than 5000 SAR.
•It is not required to issue a branch register for the same activity, practiced in the same administrative region.
Issuing the main register requires the following:
• Electronically submitting an application to establish the company.
• Submitting a letter signed by the founders establishing the company.
• Presence of a national ID.
Issuing a main register for joint-stock companies requires:
•Minimum capital of 500,000 SAR.
•Presence of the company's articles of association and articles of incorporation.
Issuing a branch register requires:
• Submitting a letter from the company stating the issuance of a company branch, including the city of the branch and the branch manager, attested by the Chamber of Commerce.
• Confirmation of the investor's deposit at the end of the company's fiscal year.
Service Description: A legal document that contains the investor's data and his activity, enabling him to carry out his activity with an official permit in accordance with the specific conditions and requirements
Additional Information:
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.				
This procedure is automated.				
This procedure requires payment.

Service Name: Request to issue a technical license
Ministry Involved: The General Authority of Civil Aviation
Conditions/Requirements:
Having a valid commercial register.
Presence of an economic license to practice the activity.
Availability of financial solvency.
Providing a brief overview of the entity and its activities.
Submission of an aircraft insurance policy from an approved insurance facility.
Submission of the Memorandum of Association.
Submission of financial statements for two years audited by a certified accountant, or Presence of a certificate proving the financial solvency of the entity.
Submission of a contract for owning or leasing the aircraft.
Presentation of the contract with the airport.
That one of the owners is not prohibited from practicing the activity in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
The activity must be added to the commercial register according to the national classification of economic activities.
Service Description: Submit a request to issue a technical license.
Additional Information: This procedure requires payment.

Additional Information: This procedure requires payment.

License Name: Marine agent activity license
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue a license to engage in the activity of maritime agency services, and to be able to be delegated by the owners or suppliers of ships to act on their behalf to perform duties towards the port, government agencies, the business sector and any other parties related to the activity.
Service Name: Issuance of an investment license for the foreign investor
Conditions/Requirements:
• The investment activity shall not be included in the list of activities excluded from foreign investment.
• Product specifications should match the Saudi, GCC  or international specifications.
• Applicant shall not have conclusive rulings against him due to violations of system provisions inside or outside the Kingdom.
• Applicant shall abide by the conditions and regulations attached to the investment license application form.
• Investment objectives shall be achieved and conditions and regulations on license renewal applications shall be implemented. 
• Presence of a license to practice commercial activity in the Kingdom for foreign investors.
• Presence of commercial register and articles of association of the facility in its country, certified by respective entities and Saudi embassy.
• A commercial register or an extract from the civil status as a proof of profession.
• Presence of Articles of association for a limited liability company.
• Presence of the articles of association for a  joint-stock company.
• Presence of the general manager's passport.
• Presence of the national ID and the family card if one of the partners has the Saudi nationality.
• Submission of the partners' decision stating their desire to invest in the Kingdom, indicating the partners' names, the capital, the ownership percentage of each partner, the main office of the facility and the nature of its activity.
• Appointment of a general manager, determining his powers and certifying it by respective entities and the Saudi embassy.
• Provision of initial approval from the relevant ministries or agencies if the activity requires approval.
• Provision of a detailed action plan.
• Submission of a minimum of 3 year budget for the facility requesting a license from outside the Kingdom, showing the soundness of the financial position. The budget must be approved by an accounting office and certified by the concerned body and the Kingdom’s embassy.
• Proof of financial capability to invest, commensurate with the project's capital and each partner's share, in line with the submitted business plan.
• Reservation of a trade name with the Ministry of Commerce.
Service Description: Issuance of an investment license for non-Saudis to practice commercial activities in accordance with the specified conditions and requirements.
Additional Information:
A value of 10,000 SAR will be added to the subscription to the services of the Investor Relations Centers at the Ministry of Investment in the first year, and 60,000 SAR in the following years/year.				
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.				
This procedure is automated.				
This action requires payment.

License Name: Marine agent activity license
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue a license to engage in the activity of maritime agency services, and to be able to be delegated by the owners or suppliers of ships to act on their behalf to perform duties towards the port, government agencies, the business sector and any other parties related to the activity.
Conditions/Requirements:
•Applicant must be 18 years old or above.
•The employee must not be a governmental employee.
•The capital shall not be less than 5000 SAR.
•It is not required to issue a branch register for the same activity, practiced in the same administrative region.
Issuing the main register requires the following:
• Electronically submitting an application to establish the company.
• Submitting a letter signed by the founders establishing the company.
• Presence of a national ID.
Issuing a main register for joint-stock companies requires:
•Minimum capital of 500,000 SAR.
•Presence of the company's articles of association and articles of incorporation.
Issuing a branch register requires:
• Submitting a letter from the company stating the issuance of a company branch, including the city of the branch and the branch manager, attested by the Chamber of Commerce.
• Confirmation of the investor's deposit at the end of the company's fiscal year.
Service Description: A legal document that contains the investor's data and his activity, enabling him to carry out his activity with an official permit in accordance with the specific conditions and requirements.
Additional Information:
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.				
This procedure is automated.				
This action requires payment.

License Name: Marine agent activity license
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue a license to engage in the activity of maritime agency services, and to be able to be delegated by the owners or suppliers of ships to act on their behalf to perform duties towards the port, government agencies, the business sector and any other parties related to the activity.
Ministry Involved:
Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development
The Zakat, Tax and Customs Authority
Saudi Post | SPL
The General Organization for Social Insurance
Conditions/Requirements: • Presence of a valid commercial register.
Service Description: Establishments and companies are automatically registered after issuing the commercial registration at the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development, the Zakat, Tax and Customs Authority, the General Organization for Social Insurance, and the Saudi Post.
Additional Information: This step is illustrative.

License Name: Marine agent activity license
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue a license to engage in the activity of maritime agency services, and to be able to be delegated by the owners or suppliers of ships to act on their behalf to perform duties towards the port, government agencies, the business sector and any other parties related to the activity.
Service Name: Issuance of a commercial activity license and safety certificate
Ministry Involved: Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing
Service Fees: Depending on the activity classification + scouting fees of 20 SAR
Conditions/Requirements:
Having a valid commercial register.
A permit from the Civil Defense, if there is an office.
Presence of articles of incorporation for companies.
Presence of the title deed or lease contract in the case of an office.
Not be prohibited from practicing the activity.
To be committed to fulfilling the conditions of the activity.
To be committed to updating the data in the system.
To be able to request the issuance of a license for his shop on his own behalf or on behalf of another, with a copy of the legal agency.
He must ensure the validity and accuracy of the data entered, bearing in mind that all transactions that take place through the beneficiary's account are binding on him.
The attached documents must match their originals.
Service Description: Fulfilling all the procedures, conditions and data necessary to conduct the commercial activity, and inspecting the site to be operated in order to license it to operate in accordance with safety conditions and requirements.
Additional Information:
This procedure is automated.				
This action requires payment.				
This step is not mandatory to issue the license but is required to run the activity.				
The investor can open the office after obtaining the license or before it as desired.

License Name: Marine agent activity license
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue a license to engage in the activity of maritime agency services, and to be able to be delegated by the owners or suppliers of ships to act on their behalf to perform duties towards the port, government agencies, the business sector and any other parties related to the activity.
Service Name: Authentication of the agency contract document
Service Description: Authentication of the document from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
Additional Information: No data available

License Name: Marine agent activity license
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue a license to engage in the activity of maritime agency services, and to be able to be delegated by the owners or suppliers of ships to act on their behalf to perform duties towards the port, government agencies, the business sector and any other parties related to the activity.
Service Name: Request to issue an operational license
Conditions/Requirements:
Presence of a valid commercial register, adding the name of the activity.
Presence of the identity number of the delegate/manager, which is linked to the commercial register of the establishment.
Registration in the Zakat, Tax and Customs Authority.
Payment the fees for issuing or renewing the license.
Appointing an executive director of Saudi nationals in the field of managing marine agencies during the validity period of the license.
Submission of a strategic action plan to increase quantities and develop business in Saudi ports, including the required Saudization rates, within a maximum period of 90 days from the date of issuance of the license.
Submission of a valid bank guarantee in favor of the management of the port in which the activity is to be practiced, irrevocable, unconditional and without restrictions, in the amount of 500,000 riyals for the period of validity of the license, and 3 months after its expiry.
The (foreign) license applicant must be the owner or operator of a shipping line, taking into account the foreign investment law and the relevant decisions.
The license applicant must comply with all instructions and regulations issued by the General Authority for Ports and the port administrations in which he works.
The license applicant must submit all information and data required by the General Authority for Ports.
The license applicant is committed to developing Saudi human resources, training them, and enabling them to occupy leadership positions with him.
The license applicant shall not transfer any activities or businesses related to the practice of maritime agencies outside the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
The license applicant shall be obligated to provide all information and data in the event of any material changes to the entity during the validity period of the license.
The license applicant undertakes his full responsibility as a fine for any act or negligence committed by him personally, or by one of his employees that harms the port, its facilities, or any damages affecting port employees, or any third party within the borders of the port, and compensating for any resulting losses unconditionally .
The license applicant shall be committed to paying and settling all his financial obligations to the Saudi Ports Authority, the port in which he works, and outsourcing contractors within 15 days from the date of issuance of any invoice or financial claims, taking into account the agreements signed between the relevant parties.
The license applicant must provide accurate data to the port administration and importers on the movement of ships belonging to his agency, and to inform them of the dates of their arrival at Saudi ports.
That the license applicant undertakes to practice the activity within a period not exceeding 90 days from the date of issuance or renewal of the license.
The license applicant must achieve a Saudization rate of not less than 60% of the administrative and leadership positions during the validity period of the license.
Service Description: Submitting a request to issue a license on the Fasah platform after submitting the required documents.
Additional Information:
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.				
This procedure is automated.

License Name: Marine agent activity license
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue a license to engage in the activity of maritime agency services, and to be able to be delegated by the owners or suppliers of ships to act on their behalf to perform duties towards the port, government agencies, the business sector and any other parties related to the activity.
Service Description: Obtaining the license after verifying the completeness of the documents and fulfilling the necessary conditions.
Additional Information:
This procedure is automated.				
This action requires payment.				
This license is valid for work in all ports, with the need to submit operational documents in the port in which the activity is to be practiced.

License Name: Licensing medical rehabilitation centers if there is an existing building
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue, renew and cancel the health license, or modify it by adding a health specialty or activity to the facility, or transfer the location or ownership of the license to another investor, in centers that provide two or more services from the following specializations: physiotherapy - occupational therapy - disease treatment Speech, communication and swallowing - Treatment of hearing diseases - Psychological treatment and rehabilitation - Foot and ankle care - Nutrition - Prosthetics.
Service Fees: Depending on the activity classification + survey fees of 20 SAR
Service Description: Obtaining the approval of the planning authority in the Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing on the site on which the activity shall  be established.
Additional Information:
This procedure is automated.
This procedure requires payment.
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.

License Name: Licensing medical rehabilitation centers if there is an existing building
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue, renew and cancel the health license, or modify it by adding a health specialty or activity to the facility, or transfer the location or ownership of the license to another investor, in centers that provide two or more services from the following specializations: physiotherapy - occupational therapy - disease treatment Speech, communication and swallowing - Treatment of hearing diseases - Psychological treatment and rehabilitation - Foot and ankle care - Nutrition - Prosthetics.
Service Name: Issuance of a commercial activity license and safety certificate
Service Fees: Depending on the classification + Survey fees of 20 SAR
Conditions/Requirements:
Having a valid commercial register.
A permit from the Civil Defense, if there is an office.
Presence of articles of association for companies.
Presence of the title deed or lease contract in the case of an office.
 Applicant must not be prohibited from practicing the activity.
To be committed to fulfilling the conditions of the activity.
To be committed to updating the data in the system.
To be able to request the issuance of a license for his store on his own behalf or on behalf of another, with a copy of the legal agency.
Applicant must ensure the validity and accuracy of the data entered, bearing in mind that all transactions that take place through the beneficiary's account are binding on him.
The attached documents shall match the original copies.
Service Description: Fulfilling all the procedures, conditions and data necessary to conduct the activity, and inspecting the site that shall be operated  to license it in accordance with safety conditions and requirements.
Additional Information:
This procedure is automated.
This proceduree requires payment.
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.

License Name: Licensing public medical complexes if there is an existing building
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue, renew, and cancel the health license, or amend it by adding a health specialty or activity to the facility, or transfer the location or ownership of the license to another investor, in the places prepared to receive patients, examine them, and treat them, and in which at least three different medical specialties are available, One of the following basic specializations: surgery - internal diseases - obstetrics and gynecology - Pediatrics - family medicine.
Service Name: Issuance an investment license for the foreign investor
Conditions/Requirements:
• The investment activity shall not be included in the list of activities excluded from foreign investment.
• Product specifications should match the Saudi, GCC  or international specifications.
• Applicant shall not have conclusive rulings against him due to violations of system provisions inside or outside the Kingdom.
• Applicant shall abide by the conditions and regulations attached to the investment license application form.
• Investment objectives shall be achieved and conditions and regulations on license renewal applications shall be implemented. 
• Presence of a license to practice commercial activity in the Kingdom for foreign investors.
• Presence of commercial register and articles of association of the facility in its country, certified by respective entities and Saudi embassy.
• A commercial register or an extract from the civil status as a proof of profession.
• Presence of Articles of association for a limited liability company.
• Presence of the articles of association for a  joint-stock company.
• Presence of the general manager's passport.
• Presence of the national ID and the family card if one of the partners has the Saudi nationality.
• Submission of the partners' decision stating their desire to invest in the Kingdom, indicating the partners' names, the capital, the ownership percentage of each partner, the main office of the facility and the nature of its activity.
• Appointment of a general manager, determining his powers and certifying it by respective entities and the Saudi embassy.
• Provision of initial approval from the relevant ministries or agencies if the activity requires approval.
• Provision of a detailed action plan.
• Submission of a minimum of 3 year budget for the facility requesting a license from outside the Kingdom, showing the soundness of the financial position. The budget must be approved by an accounting office and certified by the concerned body and the Kingdom’s embassy.
• Proof of financial capability to invest, commensurate with the project's capital and each partner's share, in line with the submitted business plan.
• Reservation of a trade name with the Ministry of Commerce.
Service Description: Issuing an investment license for non-Saudis to practice commercial activities in accordance with the specified conditions and requirements.
Additional Information:
A value of 10,000 SAR will be added to the subscription to the services of the Investor Relations Centers at the Ministry of Investment in the first year, and 60,000 SAR in the following years/year.
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.
This procedure is automated.
This procedure requires payment.

License Name: Licensing public medical complexes if there is an existing building
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue, renew, and cancel the health license, or amend it by adding a health specialty or activity to the facility, or transfer the location or ownership of the license to another investor, in the places prepared to receive patients, examine them, and treat them, and in which at least three different medical specialties are available, One of the following basic specializations: surgery - internal diseases - obstetrics and gynecology - Pediatrics - family medicine.
Conditions/Requirements:
•Applicant must be 18 years old or above.
•The employee must not be a governmental employee.
•The capital shall not be less than 5000 SAR.
•It is not required to issue a branch register for the same activity, practiced in the same administrative region.
Issuing the main register requires the following:
• Electronically submitting an application to establish the company.
• Submitting a letter signed by the founders establishing the company.
• Presence of a national ID.
Issuing a main register for joint-stock companies requires:
•Minimum capital of 500,000 SAR.
•Presence of the company's articles of association and articles of incorporation.
Issuing a branch register requires:
• Submitting a letter from the company stating the issuance of a company branch, including the city of the branch and the branch manager, attested by the Chamber of Commerce.
• Confirmation of the investor's deposit at the end of the company's fiscal year.
Service Description: A legal document that contains the investors's data and his activity, enabling him to carry out his activity with an official permit in accordance with the specific conditions and requirements.
Additional Information:
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.
This procedure is automated.
This procedure requires payment.

License Name: Licensing public medical complexes if there is an existing building
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue, renew, and cancel the health license, or amend it by adding a health specialty or activity to the facility, or transfer the location or ownership of the license to another investor, in the places prepared to receive patients, examine them, and treat them, and in which at least three different medical specialties are available, One of the following basic specializations: surgery - internal diseases - obstetrics and gynecology - Pediatrics - family medicine.

License Name: License for Energy Audit Services Provider for Industrial Facilities
License Description: This service enables investors to acquire a license that authorizes them to offer data review and energy audit services for industrial facilities. Additionally, it encompasses the provision of energy design review services.
Service Name: Issuing an Investment License for Foreign Investors
Conditions/Requirements:
• The investment activity shall not be included in the list of activities excluded from foreign investment.
• Product specifications should match the Saudi, GCC  or international specifications.
• Applicant shall not have conclusive rulings against him due to violations of system provisions inside or outside the Kingdom.
• Applicant shall abide by the conditions and regulations attached to the investment license application form.
• Investment objectives shall be achieved and conditions and regulations on license renewal applications shall be implemented. 
• To be a foreign investor with a license to practice commercial activity in the Kingdom.
• Presence of commercial register and articles of association of the facility in its country, certified by respective entities and Saudi embassy.
• A commercial register or an extract from the civil status as a proof of profession.
• Presence of Articles of association for a limited liability company.
• Presence of the articles of association for a  joint-stock company.
• Presence of the general manager's passport.
• Presence of the national ID and the family card if one of the partners has the Saudi nationality.
• Submission of the partners' decision stating their desire to invest in the Kingdom, indicating the partners' names, the capital, the ownership percentage of each partner, the main office of the facility and the nature of its activity.
• Appointment of a general manager, determining his powers and certifying it by respective entities and the Saudi embassy.
• Providing initial approval from the relevant ministries or agencies if the activity requires approval.
• Provision of a detailed action plan.
• Submission of a minimum of 3 year budget for the facility requesting a license from outside the Kingdom, showing the soundness of the financial position. The budget must be approved by an accounting office and certified by the concerned body and the Kingdom’s embassy.
• Proof of financial capability to invest, commensurate with the project's capital and each partner's share, in line with the submitted business plan.
• Reservation of a trade name with the Ministry of Commerce.
Service Description: Issuance of an investment license for non-Saudis to engage in commercial activities in accordance with the specified conditions and requirements.
Additional Information:
A value of 10,000 SAR will be added to the subscription to the services of the Investor Relations Centers at the Ministry of Investment in the first year, and 60,000 SAR in the following years/year.
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.
This procedure is automated.
This procedure requires payment.

License Name: License for Energy Audit Services Provider for Industrial Facilities
License Description: This service enables investors to acquire a license that authorizes them to offer data review and energy audit services for industrial facilities. Additionally, it encompasses the provision of energy design review services.
Conditions/Requirements:
•Applicant must be 18 years old or above.
•The employee must not be a governmental employee.
•The capital shall not be less than 5000 SAR.
•It is not required to issue a branch register for the same activity, practiced in the same administrative region.
Issuing the main register requires the following:
• Electronically submitting an application to establish the company.
• Submitting a letter signed by the founders establishing the company.
• Presence of a national ID.
Issuing a main register for joint-stock companies requires:
•Minimum capital of 500,000 SAR.
•Presence of the company's articles of association and articles of incorporation.
Issuing a branch register requires:
• Submitting a letter from the company stating the issuance of a company branch, including the city of the branch and the branch manager, attested by the Chamber of Commerce.
• Confirmation of the investor's deposit at the end of the company's fiscal year.
Service Description: A legal document that contains the investor's data and his activity, enabling him to carry out his activity with an official permit in accordance with the specific conditions and requirements.
Additional Information: This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.

License Description: This service enables investors to acquire a license that authorizes them to offer data review and energy audit services for industrial facilities. Additionally, it encompasses the provision of energy design review services.
Service Name: Employment of the required human resources
Service Description: Recruitment of highly qualified individuals.

License Name: License for Energy Audit Services Provider for Industrial Facilities
License Description: This service enables investors to acquire a license that authorizes them to offer data review and energy audit services for industrial facilities. Additionally, it encompasses the provision of energy design review services.
Conditions/Requirements:
• Create an account on the Saudi Energy Efficiency Center portal.
• Fill out the application form and the required sections (the company's experience and projects - staff capabilities - technical capabilities - company account registration information), in addition to submitting the documents shown in the form.
• Recruitment of a full-time manager with at least 5 years of experience in energy auditing; to carry out supervision and management tasks and carry out audit studies, while fulfilling the following requirements:
- Hold a CEM (Certified Energy Manager) certificate, CEA (Certified Energy Auditor) certificate, or equivalent engineering experience.
An agreement shall be made with at least two experts, such as: (consulting experts in thermal and electrical operational units and production units and their measurement, or employees with specializations similar to the aforementioned experiences).
• Proof of ownership or obtaining "calibrated" measuring devices with a minimum of 3 devices, and/or one simulation program such as: (Hysys, Aspen, Pro-ii, GT, Pro, HTRI) and others.
• The experts and specialists should have a professional experience of no less than 5 projects in energy auditing, data verification, or reviewing energy efficiency design solutions.
• A study (detailed energy audit, data verification, review of the design of energy efficiency solutions) for at least 3 projects in any of the aforementioned types, provided that the projects are in industries with high energy consumption during the past (36) months, and that in the event of a full license.
Service Description: Submitting an application to obtain a license to provide energy auditing services for industrial facilities through the Saudi Energy Efficiency Center website.
Additional Information:
This procedure is automated.
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.

License Name: Resale license for gas stations
License Description: This service enables the investor to resell petroleum products to gas stations.
Conditions/Requirements:
* Having a valid commercial or industrial license.
* Presence of an environmental rehabilitation certificate or what is equivalent to it (Modon license, or an environmental license from the Royal Commission for Jubail and Yanbu).
* Presence of a valid Transport General Authority license, which stipulates the activity of transporting petroleum products, or the Ministry of Energy’s license for the carrier in the case of an independent carrier.
* Presence of valid municipal and civil defense licenses, or licenses issued by the emirates of regions and entities not covered by civil defense services, or the Ministry of Municipal, Rural Affairs and Housing (Saudi Authority for Industrial Cities and Technology Zones, Royal Commission for Jubail and Yanbu, General Civil Aviation Entity, government agencies).
*Presence of safety procedures in accordance with the applicable standards of the relevant entities.
* Submitting periodic reports to the Ministry of Energy, and keeping documents related to commercial activity.
Registering commercial activity data at the Ministry, and updating such data whenever needed, as determined by regulatory procedures.
* The company or entity  carrying out a commercial activity shall bear responsibility for the damages and losses of petroleum products resulting from violating the laws and regulations related to the practice of commercial activity.
* The company or entity shall be committed to purchasing petroleum products from Saudi Aramco or one of its approved clients.
* The company or entity shall comply with periodic technical inspection of tanks for petroleum products.
* The company or entity shall comply with the requirements of transportation and storage in case the activity requires that.

Additional Information:
