Service Name: Issuance of an investment license for the foreign investor
Conditions/Requirements:
• The investment activity shall not be included in the list of activities excluded from foreign investment.
• Product specifications should match the Saudi, GCC  or international specifications.
• Applicant shall not have conclusive rulings against him due to violations of system provisions inside or outside the Kingdom.
• Applicant shall abide by the conditions and regulations attached to the investment license application form.
• Investment objectives shall be achieved and conditions and regulations on license renewal applications shall be implemented. 
• Presence of a license to practice commercial activity in the Kingdom for foreign investors.
• Presence of commercial register and articles of association of the facility in its country, certified by respective entities and Saudi embassy.
• A commercial register or an extract from the civil status as a proof of profession.
• Presence of Articles of association for a limited liability company.
• Presence of the articles of association for a  joint-stock company.
• Presence of the general manager's passport.
• Presence of the national ID and the family card if one of the partners has the Saudi nationality.
• Submission of the partners' decision stating their desire to invest in the Kingdom, indicating the partners' names, the capital, the ownership percentage of each partner, the main office of the facility and the nature of its activity.
• Appointment of a general manager, determining his powers and certifying it by respective entities and the Saudi embassy.
• Provision of initial approval from the relevant ministries or agencies if the activity requires approval.
• Provision of a detailed action plan.
• Submission of a minimum of 3 year budget for the facility requesting a license from outside the Kingdom, showing the soundness of the financial position. The budget must be approved by an accounting office and certified by the concerned body and the Kingdom’s embassy.
• Proof of financial capability to invest, commensurate with the project's capital and each partner's share, in line with the submitted business plan.
• Reservation of a trade name with the Ministry of Commerce.
Service Description: Issuance of an investment license for non-Saudis to practice commercial activities in accordance with the specified conditions and requirements.
Additional Information:
A value of 10,000 SAR will be added to the subscription to the services of the Investor Relations Centers at the Ministry of Investment in the first year, and 60,000 SAR in the following years/year.
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.
This procedure is automated.
This procedure requires payment.

Licensing Entity Name: Ministry of Industry and Mineral Resources
License Name: Licensing an industrial facility in Modon in the absence of an existing building
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue, renew, amend and cancel a license, or transfer his ownership to facilities that carry out manufacturing activities.
Conditions/Requirements:
•Applicant must be 18 years old or above.
•The employee must not be a governmental employee.
•The capital shall not be less than 5000 SAR.
•It is not required to issue a branch register for the same activity, practiced in the same administrative region.
Issuing the main register requires the following:
• Electronically submitting an application to establish the company.
• Submitting a letter signed by the founders establishing the company.
• Presence of a national ID.
Issuing a main register for joint-stock companies requires:
•Minimum capital of 500,000 SAR.
•Presence of the company's articles of association and articles of incorporation.
Issuing a branch register requires:
• Submitting a letter from the company stating the issuance of a company branch, including the city of the branch and the branch manager, attested by the Chamber of Commerce.
• Confirmation of the investor's deposit at the end of the company's fiscal year.
Service Description: A legal document that contains the investor's data and his activity, enabling him to carry out his activity with an official permit in accordance with the specific conditions and requirements.

This procedure is automated.
This procedure requires payment.

Licensing Entity Name: Ministry of Industry and Mineral Resources
License Name: Licensing an industrial facility in Modon in the absence of an existing building
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue, renew, amend and cancel a license, or transfer his ownership to facilities that carry out manufacturing activities.
Service Duration:
First category: 15 days
Second category: 40 days
Third category: 85 days
Conditions/Requirements:
Fill in the environmental classification form included in the list of environmental permits for the establishment and operation of activities.
Fill in a declaration form stating that there are no degraded or polluted sites for the activity.
Submission of industrial licenses for facilities located outside the scope of lands designated for industrial use.
Submission of an environmental rehabilitation plan and an environmental management plan prepared by a licensee from the National Center for Environmental Compliance.
Submission of waste disposal contracts from a licensed party.
Submission of an energy efficiency certificate for activities that require it.
Applicant must conduct a detailed environmental impact assessment study on activities that fall within the scope of environmentally sensitive areas and receptors, or at a distance not exceeding 500 meters from them, and undertake to implement the results and recommendations of the study.
Obtainment of approval of the Permanent Committee for the Protection of the Coastal Regions Environment for projects that include backfilling or dredging works, and are located within 400 meters from the shoreline.
Service Description: Approval is granted upon completion of construction operations, ensuring that all environmental permit requirements are adhered to.
Additional Information:
This procedure is partially automated.
This procedure requires payment.
The annual fee for the environmental permit for operation is calculated through this formula: environmental impact coefficient for the type of activity x size of the activity x environmental commitment coefficient for the activity.
The environmental commitment coefficient for an activity ranges between (0.8) for activities with high environmental commitment, and (1.2) for activities with low environmental commitment.

• Completing security and safety requirements for the issuance of a military license (for incorporation permits).

Submitting a site license from the host or permission from the military entity if the factory is inside military areas. 
Submitting social insurance record.
The (foreign) applicant must have a legal presence in the Kingdom in one of the following legal forms: (sole proprietorship - limited liability company - joint stock company).
One of the founders (controlling persons) shall not have been previously sentenced to penalty or an offence prejudicial to hounor or inyegrity or a disciplinary decision has been issued against him dismissing him from military service, unless he has been rehabilitated.

Service Name: Issuance of an investment license for the foreign investor
Conditions/Requirements:
• The investment activity shall not be included in the list of activities excluded from foreign investment.
• Product specifications should match the Saudi, GCC  or international specifications.
• Applicant shall not have conclusive rulings against him due to violations of system provisions inside or outside the Kingdom.
• Applicant shall abide by the conditions and regulations attached to the investment license application form.
• Investment objectives shall be achieved and conditions and regulations on license renewal applications shall be implemented. 
• Presence of a license to practice commercial activity in the Kingdom for foreign investors.
• Presence of commercial register and articles of association of the facility in its country, certified by respective entities and Saudi embassy.
• A commercial register or an extract from the civil status as a proof of profession.
• Presence of Articles of association for a limited liability company.
• Presence of the articles of association for a  joint-stock company.
• Presence of the general manager's passport.
• Presence of the national ID and the family card if one of the partners has the Saudi nationality.
• Submission of the partners' decision stating their desire to invest in the Kingdom, indicating the partners' names, the capital, the ownership percentage of each partner, the main office of the facility and the nature of its activity.
• Appointment of a general manager, determining his powers and certifying it by respective entities and the Saudi embassy.
• Provision of initial approval from the relevant ministries or agencies if the activity requires approval.
• Provision of a detailed action plan.
• Submission of a minimum of 3 year budget for the facility requesting a license from outside the Kingdom, showing the soundness of the financial position. The budget must be approved by an accounting office and certified by the concerned body and the Kingdom’s embassy.
• Proof of financial capability to invest, commensurate with the project's capital and each partner's share, in line with the submitted business plan.
• Reservation of a trade name with the Ministry of Commerce.
Service Description: Issuance of an investment license for non-Saudis to practice commercial activities in accordance with the specified conditions and requirements.
Additional Information:
A value of 10,000 SAR will be added to the subscription to the services of the Investor Relations Centers at the Ministry of Investment in the first year, and 60,000 SAR in the following years/year.
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.
This procedure is automated.
This procedure requires payment.

Conditions/Requirements:
•Applicant must be 18 years old or above.
•The employee must not be a governmental employee.
•The capital shall not be less than 5000 SAR.
•It is not required to issue a branch register for the same activity, practiced in the same administrative region.
Issuing the main register requires the following:
• Electronically submitting an application to establish the company.
• Submitting a letter signed by the founders establishing the company.
• Presence of a national ID.
Issuing a main register for joint-stock companies requires:
•Minimum capital of 500,000 SAR.
•Presence of the company's articles of association and articles of incorporation.
Issuing a branch register requires:
• Submitting a letter from the company stating the issuance of a company branch, including the city of the branch and the branch manager, attested by the Chamber of Commerce.
• Confirmation of the investor's deposit at the end of the company's fiscal year.
Service Description: A legal document that contains the investor's data and his activity, enabling him to carry out his activity with an official permit in accordance with the specific conditions and requirements.
Additional Information:
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.
This procedure is automated.
This procedure requires payment.

Licensing Entity Name: Ministry of Industry and Mineral Resources
License Name: License of an industrial facility in Modon in the absence of an existing building, highlighting the steps related to the National Center for Environmental Compliance
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue, renew, amend and cancel a license, or transfer his ownership of facilities that carry out manufacturing industries.
Service Fees:
First category: 1000 SAR
Second category: 10,000 SAR
Third Category: Detailed in Additional Information
Service Duration:
First category: 15 days
Second category: 40 days
Third category: 85 days
Conditions/Requirements:
Filling in the environmental classification form included in the list of environmental permits for the establishment and operation of activities.
Filling in a declaration form that there are no degraded or polluted sites for the activity.
Submitting an environmental rehabilitation plan prepared by a licensee from the National Center for Environmental Compliance.
Submitting waste disposal contracts from a licensed party.
Obtaining approval of the Permanent Committee for the Protection of the Coastal Regions Environemnt for projects that include backfilling or dredging works and are located within 400 meters of the shore line.
Undertaking the implementation of the results and recommendations of the environmental impact assessment study of the activities.
Service Description: Granting a document to allow the commencement of construction work after completing the classification and assessment of the activity and the expected environmental impacts, and specifying the environmental conditions and requirements to be complied with during the construction work.
Additional Information:
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.
This procedure is partially automated.
This procedure requires payment.
The financial fee for reviewing the environmental classification form is 500 riyals.
The fee for the third category depending on the construction cost:
13,000 SAR for projects whose construction cost is 10 million.
27,500 SAR for projects whose construction cost ranges between 10 and 25 million.
45,000 SAR for projects whose construction cost ranges between 25 and 50 million.
 75,000 SAR for projects whose construction cost ranges between 50 and 100 million.
 137,500 SAR for projects whose construction cost ranges between 100 and 250 million.
275,000 SAR for projects whose construction cost exceeds 250 million.

Licensing Entity Name: Ministry of Industry and Mineral Resources
License Name: License of an industrial facility in Modon in the absence of an existing building, highlighting the steps related to the National Center for Environmental Compliance
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue, renew, amend and cancel a license, or transfer his ownership of facilities that carry out manufacturing industries.
Service Duration:
First category: 15 days
Second category: 40 days
Third category: 85 days
Conditions/Requirements:
Fill in the environmental classification form included in the list of environmental permits for the establishment and operation of activities.
Fill in a declaration form stating that there are no degraded or polluted sites for the activity.
Submission of industrial licenses for facilities located outside the scope of lands designated for industrial use.
Submission of an environmental rehabilitation plan and an environmental management plan prepared by a licensee from the National Center for Environmental Compliance.
Submission of waste disposal contracts from a licensed party.
Submission of an energy efficiency certificate for activities that require it.
Applicant must conduct a detailed environmental impact assessment study on activities that fall within the scope of environmentally sensitive areas and receptors, or at a distance not exceeding 500 meters from them, and undertake to implement the results and recommendations of the study.
Obtainment of approval of the Permanent Committee for the Protection of the Coastal Regions Environment for projects that include backfilling or dredging works, and are located within 400 meters from the shoreline.
Service Description: Approval is granted upon completion of construction operations, ensuring that all environmental permit requirements are adhered to.
Additional Information:
This procedure is partially automated.
This procedure requires payment.
The annual fee for the environmental permit for operation is calculated through this formula: environmental impact coefficient for the type of activity x size of the activity x environmental commitment coefficient for the activity.
The environmental commitment coefficient for an activity ranges between (0.8) for activities with high environmental commitment, and (1.2) for activities with low environmental commitment.

Licensing Entity Name: Ministry of Industry and Mineral Resources
License Name: License of an industrial facility in Modon in the absence of an existing building, highlighting the steps related to the National Center for Environmental Compliance

Ministry Involved:
The General Authority for Military Industries
SDFA
Conditions/Requirements:
•Presenting a valid commercial register specifying the commercial activities licensed by the Authority.
Complying with the regulations governing the practice of military industries activities, and all relevant laws and regulations in the Kingdom.
Registering in the military licensing platform, and filling in the data of each of (the applicant – the CEO – the authorized person), adding all controlling persons, and ensuring that the information and details are correct.
• Completing security and safety requirements for the issuance of a military license (for incorporation permits).
Providing the Authority with any update on the information as soon as it occurs.
Clarifying the names of the products that shall be manufactured.
Filling in the initial information about the scope of research and development, if there is a field (research and development).
Filling in the actual information for manufacturing and products in detail.
Updating the data of the authorized person and the controlling persons in case of change.
Submitting a security and safety certificate/letter from the High Commission for Industrial Security.
Submitting a site license from the host or permission from the military entity if the factory is inside military areas. 
Submitting social insurance record.
The (foreign) applicant must have a legal presence in the Kingdom in one of the following legal forms: (sole proprietorship - limited liability company - joint stock company).
One of the founders (controlling persons) shall not have been previously sentenced to penalty or an offence prejudicial to hounor or inyegrity or a disciplinary decision has been issued against him dismissing him from military service, unless he has been rehabilitated.
Service Description: Submitting a request to obtain a manufacturing license depending on the activity.
Additional Information:
This step is illustrative and not mandatory for license issuance.
This procedure is automated.
This step is activated if the activity is licensed by the General Authority for Military Industries or the SDFA

License Name: License for a shopping mall activity
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue a license for commercial complexes, which are large closed markets with multiple floors, containing various activities such as shops, entertainment, and restaurants.
Service Name: Issuance of a commercial complex activity license
Conditions/Requirements:
General requirements:
• Presence of a valid commercial register.
• Having a construction license.
•The activity license shall be placed in a prominent place in the store, and it is forbidden to use it for other than the purpose for which it was allocated.
• The activity shall not be changed and the area of ​​the shop shall not be modified by increasing or decreasing it without obtaining the approval of the competent municipality.
• The shop shall not be connected to a residence or another place.
• Shops shall not be exploited in activities disturbing comfort or harmful to public health or the environment.
• A lease contract shall be submitted if the applicant is a tenant.
• Commitment to meet the requirements of persons with disabilities in order to facilitate their movement, and to create appropriate conditions, dimensions and spaces for them in accordance with the standards of commercial establishments and the Saudi Building Code.

Site requirements:
• The site shall be designated for commercial use and on a main commercial street, or in the sub-district centers, or in the investment sites of the municipality.
• The site shall be far from gas stations, gas selling places, or any facilities that may cause danger, so that a street or a plot is separated between the project site and any of these facilities, the width of which is not less than 25 m.
• Entry and exit shall be from the side of the commercial street only (emergency exits shall be opened on secondary streets).
• It shall not be allowed to make entrances or exits at street intersections. The distance between the corner of the site at the main intersection to the axis of the entrance or exit shall not be less than 35 meters to prevent causing traffic obstruction at the intersection.
Obtaining the approval of the competent authority for sites that are not designated for uses, such as commercial centers in the structural plans in cities and villages, according to the instructions regulating this.
The length of the land facade on the commercial streets shall not be less than 50 m.
A feasibility study for the project shall be prepared, showing the objectives and expected results for large projects that site area is not less than 10,000 square meters.
The minimum area of ​​the site shall not be less than 3000 square meters.
A car park for each store in the complex or commercial center shall be provided.
A parking for the visitors of the center shall be provided at the rate of one car park for every 50 square meters of the total area allocated for the commercial use of the center.
 Parking lots shall be allocated for people with disabilities from 5% of the public parking lots, with a minimum of two parking spaces, provided that they are close to the entrances of the market, and the parking lots for people with disabilities shall be marked with their logo, and the area allocated for their cars shall not be less than 25 square meters, according to the dimensions shown for the requirements of the municipality services related to the people with disabilities issued from the  Ministry's Agency of Technical Affairs.
The height of the entrance roof and the ceiling of the basement shall not be less than 2.5m in the event of implementing parking lots in the basement.
Special requirements:
• The municipal and technical requirements for public shops shall be met.
• The requirements of commercial panels shall be met.
Service Description: Issuance of a license for commercial complexes, which are large closed markets with multiple floors, containing various activities such as shops, entertainment, and restaurants.
Additional Information:
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.
This procedure is automated.

 Applicant must not be prohibited from practicing the activity.

Licensing Entity Name: Ministry of Municipal and Rural Affairs and Housing
License Name: Headquarters activity License
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue a license for the offices of companies and institutions.
Service Name: Issuance of an investment license for the foreign investor
Conditions/Requirements:
• The investment activity shall not be included in the list of activities excluded from foreign investment.
• Product specifications should match the Saudi, GCC  or international specifications.
• Applicant shall not have conclusive rulings against him due to violations of system provisions inside or outside the Kingdom.
• Applicant shall abide by the conditions and regulations attached to the investment license application form.
• Investment objectives shall be achieved and conditions and regulations on license renewal applications shall be implemented. 
• Presence of a license to practice commercial activity in the Kingdom for foreign investors.
• Presence of commercial register and articles of association of the facility in its country, certified by respective entities and Saudi embassy.
• A commercial register or an extract from the civil status as a proof of profession.
• Presence of Articles of association for a limited liability company.
• Presence of the articles of association for a  joint-stock company.
• Presence of the general manager's passport.
• Presence of the national ID and the family card if one of the partners has the Saudi nationality.
• Submission of the partners' decision stating their desire to invest in the Kingdom, indicating the partners' names, the capital, the ownership percentage of each partner, the main office of the facility and the nature of its activity.
• Appointment of a general manager, determining his powers and certifying it by respective entities and the Saudi embassy.
• Provision of initial approval from the relevant ministries or agencies if the activity requires approval.
• Provision of a detailed action plan.
• Submission of a minimum of 3 year budget for the facility requesting a license from outside the Kingdom, showing the soundness of the financial position. The budget must be approved by an accounting office and certified by the concerned body and the Kingdom’s embassy.
• Proof of financial capability to invest, commensurate with the project's capital and each partner's share, in line with the submitted business plan.
• Reservation of a trade name with the Ministry of Commerce.
Service Description: Issuing an investment license for non-Saudis to practice commercial activities in accordance with the specified conditions and requirements.
Additional Information: A value of 10,000 SAR shall be added to the subscription to the services of the Investor Relations Centers at the Ministry of Investment in the first year, and 60,000 SAR in the following years/year.

Licensing Entity Name: Ministry of Municipal and Rural Affairs and Housing
License Name: Headquarters activity License
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue a license for the offices of companies and institutions.
Conditions/Requirements:
•Applicant must be 18 years old or above.
•The employee must not be a governmental employee.
•The capital shall not be less than 5000 SAR.
•It is not required to issue a branch register for the same activity, practiced in the same administrative region.
Issuing the main register requires the following:
• Electronically submitting an application to establish the company.
• Submitting a letter signed by the founders establishing the company.
• Presence of a national ID.
Issuing a main register for joint-stock companies requires:
•Minimum capital of 500,000 SAR.
•Presence of the company's articles of association and articles of incorporation.
Issuing a branch register requires:
• Submitting a letter from the company stating the issuance of a company branch, including the city of the branch and the branch manager, attested by the Chamber of Commerce.
• Confirmation of the investor's deposit at the end of the company's fiscal year.
Service Description: A legal document that contains the investor's data and his activity, enabling him to carry out his activity with an official license in accordance with the specific conditions and requirements.
Additional Information:
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.
This procedure is automated.
This procedure requires payment.

Licensing Entity Name: Ministry of Municipal and Rural Affairs and Housing
License Name: Headquarters activity License
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue a license for the offices of companies and institutions.
Service Name: Request to issue a license to practice an economic activity
Conditions/Requirements:
General requirements:
• Presence of a valid commercial register.
• Having a construction license.
•The activity license shall be placed in a prominent place in the store, and it is forbidden to use it for other than the purpose for which it was allocated.
• The activity shall not be changed and the area of ​​the shop shall not be modified by increasing or decreasing it without obtaining the approval of the competent municipality.
• The shop shall not be connected to a residence or another place.
• Shops shall not be exploited in activities disturbing comfort or harmful to public health or the environment.
• A lease contract shall be submitted if the applicant is a tenant.
• Commitment to meet the requirements of persons with disabilities in order to facilitate their movement, and to create appropriate conditions, dimensions and spaces for them in accordance with the standards of commercial establishments and the Saudi Building Code.

Site requirements:
•  Car parks shall be provided at the rate of one car park per 25 square meters, with a minimum of one car per site.
• The site shall be on a commercial street with a ground floor, or a ground floor and mezzanine, and it could be within the repeated floors of commercial buildings, with certain conditions and the approval of the competent municipality.
• The store area shall not be less than 24 square metres, and the width of the façade shall not be 
less than 4 square metres

Special requirements:
• The municipal and technical requirements for public stores shall be met.
• The requirements of commercial panels shall be met.
• The safety requirements for the instant licensing of administrative offices whose area is less than 930 square meters shall be met.
Service Description: Submitting a license application to the headquarters upon fulfilling all the procedures, conditions and data necessary to conduct the commercial activity, and inspecting the site to be operated in order to license it to operate in accordance with safety conditions and requirements.
Additional Information:
* This step requires adding an account on Balady platform.
* The license is issued instantly in conjunction with the issuance of the safety permit in the event that the area of ​​the shop is less than or equal to 150 square meters, and includes shops and workshops.
* The license is issued instantly in conjunction with the issuance of the safety permit in the event that the area of ​​the store is less than or equal to 465 square meters, and includes restaurants and the similarities.
* The license is issued instantly in conjunction with the issuance of the safety permit in the event that the area of ​​the shop is less than or equal to 930 square meters, and includes office activities.
* Some activities require the submission of a safety technical report, others require a safety equipment invoice.
* Some activities require a cleaning contract, and it depends on the municipalities and settings in the municipality, as it can be read from the Balady platform.

Licensing Entity Name: Ministry of Municipal and Rural Affairs and Housing
License Name: Retail license for ready-to-wear for joint stores
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue a license to sell men's, women's and kids' clothing and accessories.
Service Name: Request to issue a license to practice an economic activity
Conditions/Requirements:
General requirements:
• Presence of a valid commercial register.
• Having a construction license.
•The activity license shall be placed in a prominent place in the store, and it is forbidden to use it for other than the purpose for which it was allocated.
• The activity shall not be changed and  the area of ​​the shop shall not be modified by increasing or decreasing it without obtaining the approval of the competent municipality.
• The shop shall not be connected to a residence or another place.
• Shops shall not be exploited in activities disturbing comfort or harmful to public health or the environment.
• The lease contract shall be submitted if the applicant is a tenant.
• Commitment to meet the requirements of persons with disabilities in order to facilitate their movement, and to create appropriate conditions, dimensions and spaces for them in accordance with the standards of commercial facilities and the Saudi Building Code.

Site requirements:
• The location shall be on a commercial street with a ground floor, or a ground floor and mezzanine, and it could be within the repeated floors of commercial buildings, with certain conditions and the approval of the competent municipality.
• The area of ​​the store shall not be less than 24 square metres, and the width of the facade shall not be less than 4 square metres.
• Car parks at the rate of one car park per 25 square meters shall be provided, with a minimum of one car per site.
• The activity shall be in the commercial and mixed buildings (commercial and residential) in the event that the shops are closed in the city, and the activity is in a part of the building.
• The location shall be in the logistics area or the warehouse area in the event that the closed shops are outside the urban bloc, and the activity is happening in a part of the building or a separate location.
• The location shall be on the commercial streets in case the shops are closed, and the activity is happening in a part of the building.
• The activity shall be on the available streets, within the logistics services area or the warehouse area in case the stores are closed, and the activity is in a separate location.
• One parking lot for every 70 square meters shall be provided in the event that the closed shops are in a separate location.
• It is not required to provide parking spaces if the closed shops are within a part of the building.
• Kiosks and malls are allowed if the stores are closed in the city, and the activity is happening in independent locations.
Special requirements:
• Municipal and technical requirements for public shops shall be met. (Link)
• Means of electronic payment shall be provided before carrying out the activity.
• The requirements of commercial panels shall be met. (Link)
• It shall not be allowed to provide direct services to customers except through the delivery service if the stores are closed.
• The requirements of closed stores shall be met. (Link)
Service Description: A request for a license to sell ready-to-wear clothing to individuals upon fulfilling all the procedures, conditions and data necessary to conduct the commercial activity, and inspecting the site thst shall be operated in order to license it to operate in accordance with safety conditions and requirements.
Additional Information:
* This step requires adding an account on Balady platform.
* The license is issued instantly in conjunction with the issuance of the safety permit in the event that the area of ​​the shop is less than or equal to 150 square meters, and includes shops and workshops.
* The license is issued instantly in conjunction with the issuance of the safety permit in the event that the area of ​​the store is less than or equal to 465 square meters, and includes restaurants and the like.
* The license is issued instantly in conjunction with the issuance of the safety permit in the event that the area of ​​the shop is less than or equal to 930 square meters, and includes office activities.
* Some activities require the submission of a safety technical report, others require a safety equipment invoice.
* Some activities require a cleaning contract, and it depends on the municipalities and settings in the municipality, as it can be read from  Balady platform.
*It shall be allowed to add coffee shop activities, cafeterias and buffets with a separate license.

• Provision of initial approval from the relevant ministries or agencies if the activity requires approval.
• Provision of a detailed action plan.
• Submission of a minimum of 3 year budget for the facility requesting a license from outside the Kingdom, showing the soundness of the financial position. The budget must be approved by an accounting office and certified by the concerned body and the Kingdom’s embassy.
• Proof of financial capability to invest, commensurate with the project's capital and each partner's share, in line with the submitted business plan.
• Reservation of a trade name with the Ministry of Commerce.
Service Description: Issuing an investment license for non-Saudis to practice commercial activities in accordance with the specified conditions and requirements.
Additional Information:
A value of 10,000 SAR will be added to the subscription to the services of the Investor Relations Centers at the Ministry of Investment in the first year, and 60,000 SAR in the following years/year.
This procedure requires creating a new account if it does not exist.
This procedure is automated.
This procedure requires payment.

Licensing Entity Name: Ministry of Municipal and Rural Affairs and Housing
License Name: Retail activity of electrical equipment License
License Description: This service enables the investor to issue a license for the retail sale of electrical equipment and its extensions.
Service Name: Request to issue a license to practice an economic activity
Conditions/Requirements:
General requirements:
• Presence of a valid commercial register.
•  Presence of a construction license.
•The activity license shall be placed in a prominent place in the store, and it is forbidden to use it for other than the purpose for which it was allocated.
• The activity shall not be changed and  the area of ​​the shop shall not be modified by increasing or decreasing it without obtaining the approval of the competent municipality.
• The shop shall not be connected to a residence or another place.
• Shops shall not be exploited in activities disturbing comfort or harmful to public health or the environment.
• The lease contract shall be submitted if the applicant is a tenant.
• Commitment to meet the requirements of persons with disabilities in order to facilitate their movement, and to create appropriate conditions, dimensions and spaces for them in accordance with the standards of commercial facilities and the Saudi Building Code.

Site requirements:
• The showroom shall be on a commercial street (inside or outside cities) or in an industrial area, provided that it is within a building licensed for commercial use.
• Car parks at the rate of one car park per 25 m2 shall be provided, with a minimum of one car per site.
• The activity shall be within the commercial and mixed buildings (commercial-residential) in the event that the stores are closed in the city, and the activity is inside a part of the building.
• The location shall be in the logistics area or the warehouse area in the event the closed shops are outside the urban bloc, and the activity is inside a part of the building or a separate location.
• The location shall be on the commercial streets if the shops are closed, and the activity is within a part of the building.
• The activity shall be on the available streets, and within the logistics services area or the warehouse area in the events that the stores are closed, and the activity is in a separate location.
• One parking lot shall be provided for every 70 square meters in the event that the closed shops are within a separate site.
• It shall not required to provide parking spaces if the closed shops are within a part of the building.
• Kiosks and malls are allowed if the stores are closed within the city, and the activity is within independent locations.
Special requirements:
• The requirements of shops selling construction materials shall be met. ( Link)
• Means of electronic payment shall be provided before carrying out the activity.
• The requirements of commercial panels shall be met. (Link)
• Direct services shall not be provided to customers except through the delivery service in case the stores are closed.
• The requirements of closed stores shall be met. (Link)
Service Description: A request for a license to sell electrical equipment and their extensions to individuals upon fulfilling all the procedures, conditions, and data necessary to conduct the activity, and inspecting the site that shall be operated to license it in accordance with safety conditions and requirements.
Additional Information:
* This step requires adding an account on Balady platform.
* The license is issued instantly in conjunction with the issuance of the safety permit in the event that the area of ​​the shop is less than or equal to 150 squared meters, and includes shops and workshops.
* The license is issued instantly in conjunction with the issuance of the safety permit in the event that the area of ​​the store is less than or equal to 465 squared meters, and includes restaurants and the like.
* The license is issued instantly in conjunction with the issuance of the safety permit in the event that the area of ​​the shop is less than or equal to 930 squared meters, and includes office activities.
* Some activities require the submission of a safety technical report, and others require a safety equipment invoice.
* Some activities require a cleaning contract, and it depends on the municipalities and settings in the municipality, which can be read from the Balady platform.
